column1: Little Goat Diner////We sat and sat and sat
column3: then I asked the bus boy to let someone know we are here and haven't been greeted. He finished cleaning his table
column4: the told someone. The waiter was scatterbrained
column5: didn't mention the specials until we asked about them
column6: there was no soup because "the chefs didn't like the way it turned out".
